msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Wow. You're really curious about the stuff in my house, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But you aren't going to discover any secrets to becoming a world-class athlete just by staring at my stuff.

<20_2 arg="10" />Ah, my .<20_2 arg="9" />As you can smell, it soaks up a ton of my post-workout sweat.<20_3 arg="6" />It's like I'm swaddled in a cocoon of gym socks and old yoga mats.<20_3 arg="3" />I guess you could say I sleep like a baby—a really muscular baby, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />For a long time, I didn't know there was anything other than sports on TV. Who needs all that news stuff?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I really like shows, but sometimes I cheer so hard, my muscles get sore!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Working out while listening to music on my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I just move to the beat, my muscles will be busting out of my shirt! Try it once and you won't be able to stop!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What? Are you surprised that I have ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It might come as a surprise, but I'm deeply concerned about time.If you wanna bulk up, you gotta get serious! There's only so many hours in the day to work out, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Plants grow super fast, right? But I never see 'em growing, no matter how hard I stare at 'em.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Does that mean they're growing like crazy when I'm asleep? Whoa I'm kinda freakin' myself out here.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My is critical for my training!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I do squats until my legs are noodley and I'm soaked with sweat. Then I hop into the tubI basically turn into a big bowl of ramen, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, you liking my ?If I'm not working out, sometimes I'll sit there and read. It, umdoesn't get used much, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been trying to use for leg training lately.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's easy! All you do is ALMOST sit in the chair. Stand there keeping your butt juuuuust above the seat.It'll turn your legs to jelly!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My is so I'll have an excuse to show off my muscles someday.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Picture it—I'm rocking out on stage, fans're screaming, got my biceps shinin' in the spotlightso awesome!Learning an instrument takes a long time though. You really gotta stick with it, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You checking out my ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I read that the best way to up your gains was learning to cook and controlling what goes in your food.So far I've figured out how to boil water, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That catch your eye? Pretty sweet, ain't it?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But equipment's only half the equation. You gotta know how to use it right too, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What's with the look? Is it my ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hey, sometimes I wanna feel like I'm roughing it, even when I'm all snug in my house, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh You're checking out my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I have this recurring nightmare where someone steals all of my muscles.The extra light makes it way easier to make sure my muscles are still there and get back to doing snore reps!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />OK, I'm going to be totally honest with you, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />The only reason I even own is to test muscle poses.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! You really shouldn't open my <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />At least, not unless you like the smell of sweaty workout clothes, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sometimes I think I'm pretty fit, but I think twice when I look at my . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Bugs are crazy! Some of 'em can lift a hundred times their own body weight. If only
This little guy? He's here to help inspire me to swim more. He's . One day, if I work hard enough, I might even be able to swim without floaties, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Surprised to see a great work of art in here, huh? Why yes, it's my !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I do have to be a little more careful when I do my practice in here, but it's so worth it.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Something caught your eye, huh? My ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm all about multifunctional stuff like that. It's a decorationthat I can use as a free weight!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What? Didn't expect to see ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm not all about muscles and sweat.<10_4 /> Just MOSTLY about muscles and sweat, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yeah, it can get pretty chilly in here when I fire up the old .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I actually have to be careful when I'm cooling down after a big workout. Don't wanna deep-freeze my glutes!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, if you wanna lose a staring contest, keep on looking right at my .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Trust me, you can't win with that thing. I sprained an eyeball trying!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ohthat. Yeah, I commissioned that portrait when I was in absolute peak physical condition.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, I'm STILL in absolute peak physical condition, but it's nice to have the photo, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, you're wondering about my , eh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, you know how nostalgia is. That's why I keep that thing around. I definitely don't still play with it

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, did that catch your eye? Why, yes, you've found my treasured !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />See? I'm not just all about muscles and gains and , right? I have depth! I'm sophisticated!You can't see my brain muscle, but it's flexing SUPER hard right now.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Lately, I've been into doodads like my here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I did have a dream that one came to life and was chasing me. ButI set a new dream-10K PR, so it's all good!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You're giving me this look like, "Does he really use ?"<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Of COURSE I use it, . It's not like I have a kettlebell instead of a brain.Althoughif I didimagine how strong my neck would get
